info.title: Licensius
info.description: Licensing related services.  These services provide additional information on common licenses (e.g. Creative Commons, Open Data Commons, etc.), their compatibility and their meaning.

get.description: Nothing more than a test call.

200.description: A hello world string to test the service availability

get.summary: Obtains a list of unique license identifiers
get.description: Obtains a list of unique identifiers of well-known licenses to be used for general works and data. This identifier can be further queried in order to obtain advanced information.  The license identifiers are dereferenceable and further information can be obtained by simply resolving the URI

get.summary: Gets the license document in plain text
get.description: Obtains the license text in a plain format.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: Identifier of a well-known license. For example, http://purl.org/NET/rdflicense/gpl2.0

parameters.name: lan
parameters.description: Language code to be obtained. ISO 639 1 Examples; en, es, id... . If no parameter is provided, all the documents are given

get.summary: Retrieves info about a particular license
get.description: Obtains a list of properties related to a certain license.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: Identifier of a well-known license. For example, http://purl.org/NET/rdflicense/gpl2.0

200.description: A list of properties about the license

get.summary: Guesses the license in a RDF document pointed by a URI.
get.description: Obtains a list guessed licenses in the Linked Data resource. Triples with the property dct:license etc. are scanned.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI to the RDF document where the license will be scanned. For example, http://www.geonames.org/ontology/ontology_v3.1.rdf or http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1.owl

post.summary: Guesses the license in a RDF document.
post.description: Obtains a list guessed licenses in the Linked Data resource. Triples with the property dct:license etc. are scanned.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: RDF document where the license will be scanned.

get.summary: Guesses the license in a text fragment pointed by a URI.
get.description: Obtains a list guessed licenses in a text document. Known text fragments are searched.

parameters.name: txt
parameters.description: URI to a text document where the license will be scanned. For example the document may contain "This work is under a cc-by license". It can also be a URI to a text document.

post.summary: Guesses the license in a text fragment.
post.description: Obtains a list guessed licenses in a text document. Known text fragments are searched.

parameters.name: txt
parameters.description: Text where the license will be scanned. For example "This work is under a cc-by license"

get.summary: Determines if a license is "open" according to certain criteria.
get.description: Determines if a license is "open" according to the http://www.opendefinition.com.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: License identifier. For example, http://purl.org/NET/rdflicense/cc-by3.0 or http://purl.org/NET/rdflicense/ukogl-nc2.0

get.summary: Determines if a license is compatible with another license, and returns a possible compatible license.
get.description: Compatibility is given according to the license creator (if this info exists) or otherwise calculated

get.summary: Validates a ODRL document. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED.
get.description: Determines whether an RDF document conforms or not to the ODRL specification

get.summary: Transcodes an ODRL document across the different syntaxes. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED.
get.description: Transcodes an ODRL document across the different syntaxes RDF, XML, JSON

get.summary: Authorizes an ODRL request. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED.

source.description: Source of the original text (URI if any).
